name: Love My Lips: Caring Lip Oil
about: What it is:A lip oil that is infused with hyaluronic acid and tsubaki oil..Benefits:Hydrating.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates lips..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens..What Else You Need to Know:This silky, non-sticky lip oil is infused with hyaluronic
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates lips. ..Hydrogenated Polydecene, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Camellia Japonica (Tsubaki) Seed Oil, Raspberry Seed Oil/Tocopheryl Succinate Aminopropanediol Esters, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Aroma (Flavor), Ethyl Vanillin, +/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply as often as needed.
